entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
